tables.relation:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_relation` (
  `relation_id` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `relation_type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `relation_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_id` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `item_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`relation_id`),
  KEY `parent_id` (`parent_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.relation_item:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_relation_item` (
  `relation_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`relation_id`,`poster_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.relation_request:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_relation_request` (
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `relation_type` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '4' COMMENT 'relation_type_member: 4',
  `status` enum('sent','received','ignored','canceled','accepted') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'sent',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`parent_id`,`poster_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.relation_type:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_relation_type` (
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `relation_type` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `type_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `relation_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_build` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `description` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  PRIMARY KEY (`type_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `parent_type` (`parent_type`,`relation_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
